    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    ValueWithAttributes ErrorWarning

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:String
        • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:ErrorWarning

      • Description

        The error in textual format.
        Additional Documentation 
        Type Value
        Implementers Assigned XSD Type: {http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema}StringLength1to64

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<ErrorWarning code="2" docURL="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" language="en" nodeList="Example String Value" recordID="Example String Value" shortText="Example String Value" status="Complete" statusExtension="status_Other_Value" tag="Example String Value" type="Advisory" typeExtension="type_Other_Value" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4">Example String Value</ErrorWarning>

      Example JSON

      {
  "ErrorWarning" : {
    "value" : "Example String Value",
    "language" : "en",
    "type" : "Advisory",
    "typeExtension" : "type_Other_Value",
    "shortText" : "Example String Value",
    "code" : "2",
    "docURL" : "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema",
    "tag" : "Example String Value",
    "recordID" : "Example String Value",
    "nodeList" : "Example String Value",
    "status" : "Complete",
    "statusExtension" : "status_Other_Value"
  }
}

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        language
        The language in which the error is returned.
        Details
        Type LanguageCode
        Example Value en
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        type
        The category of error or warning.
        Details
        Type ErrorWarningType_Enum
        Example Value Advisory
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        shortText
        An abbreviated version of the error in textual format.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        code
        If present, this refers to a table of coded values exchanged between applications to identify errors or warnings. Refer to OpenTravel Code List Error Codes (ERR).
        Details
        Type OTA_Code
        Example Value 2
        Required false
        Pattern [0-9A-Z]{1,4}(\.[A-Z]{3}(\.X){0,1}){0,1}
        Max Occurrences 1
        docURL
        If present, this URL refers to an online description of the error that occurred.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:anyURI
        Example Value http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        tag
        If present, this attribute may identify an unknown or misspelled tag that caused an error in processing. It is recommended that the Tag attribute use XPath notation to identify the location of a tag in the event that more than one tag of the same name is present in the document. Alternatively, the tag name alone can be used to identify missing data [Type=ReqFieldMissing].
        Details
        Type String
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        recordID
        If present, this attribute allows for batch processing and the identification of the record that failed amongst a group of records. This value may contain a concatenation of a unique failed transaction ID with specific record(s) associated with that transaction.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        nodeList
        An XPath expression that selects all the nodes whose data caused this error. Further, this expression should have an additional contraint which contains the data of the node. This will provide the offending data back to systems that cannot maintain the original message.
        Details
        Type String
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        status
        Identfies the status condition.
        Details
        Type Status_Enum
        Example Value Complete
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
